pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 9, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, February 9, 2017:

Iqaluit, Nunavut

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Indigenous and Northern Affairs, Carolyn Bennett; the Minister of Health, Jane Philpott; the Minister of Families, Children and Social Development, Jean-Yves Duclos; and the Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Indigenous and Northern Affairs, Yvonne Jones, will meet with Inuit Tapiriit Kanatami.

Igluvut Building
922 Niaqunngusiariaq
Iqaluit, Nunavut

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability.

2625 Nanuq
Iqaluit, Nunavut

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nunavut, Peter Taptuna.

Legislative Assembly of Nunavut
926 Federal Road
Iqaluit, Nunavut

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community tea and bannock event.

Inuksuk High School
1 Ring Road
Iqaluit, Nunavut

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

Note: all times local
